statements.text: I visited my grandparents on Saturday.
I spent all of Sunday watching movies because it was raining.
I cooked pasta for dinner on Saturday night.

clues: A photo on Alex's social media from Sunday shows him at the beach.
The weather report for your area on Sunday shows it was sunny all day.

statements.text: I work in a large office building downtown.
I am a graphic designer for a technology company.
I have a meeting with my boss every single morning at 9 AM.

clues: A colleague mentions that your boss travels a lot and is often not in the office.
Sara's public calendar shows she only has a team meeting on Mondays and Fridays.

statements.text: My dog is a small, brown poodle.
He loves to play fetch in the park.

clues: Ben recently posted a picture of a large golden retriever with the caption 'My boy Rocky!'
You remember Ben telling you he needs to buy a lot of dog food because his dog is very big.
